member.name: T:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Builder.RequestLocalizationOptions
member.summary: Specifies options for the .

member.name: M:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Builder.RequestLocalizationOptions.#ctor
member.summary: Creates a new with default values.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Builder.RequestLocalizationOptions.CultureInfoUseUserOverride
member.summary: Configures . Defaults to true.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Builder.RequestLocalizationOptions.DefaultRequestCulture
member.summary: Gets or sets the default culture to use for requests when a supported culture could not be determined by one of the configured s. Defaults to and .

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Builder.RequestLocalizationOptions.FallBackToParentCultures
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to set a request culture to an parent culture in the case the culture determined by the configured s is not in the list but a parent culture is. Defaults to true;
member.remarks: Note that the parent culture check is done using only the culture name.
member.example: If this property is true and the application is configured to support the culture "fr", but not the culture "fr-FR", and a configured determines a request's culture is "fr-FR", then the request's culture will be set to the culture "fr", as it is a parent of "fr-FR".

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Builder.RequestLocalizationOptions.FallBackToParentUICultures
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to set a request UI culture to a parent culture in the case the UI culture determined by the configured s is not in the list but a parent culture is. Defaults to true;
member.remarks: Note that the parent culture check is done using ony the culture name.
member.example: If this property is true and the application is configured to support the UI culture "fr", but not the UI culture "fr-FR", and a configured determines a request's UI culture is "fr-FR", then the request's UI culture will be set to the culture "fr", as it is a parent of "fr-FR".

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Builder.RequestLocalizationOptions.ApplyCurrentCultureToResponseHeaders
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that determines if is applied to the response Content-Language header.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Builder.RequestLocalizationOptions.SupportedCultures
member.summary: The cultures supported by the application. The will only set the current request culture to an entry in this list. Defaults to .

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Builder.RequestLocalizationOptions.SupportedUICultures
member.summary: The UI cultures supported by the application. The will only set the current request culture to an entry in this list. Defaults to .

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Builder.RequestLocalizationOptions.RequestCultureProviders
member.summary: An ordered list of providers used to determine a request's culture information. The first provider that returns a non-null result for a given request will be used. Defaults to the following:
